## jx step nexus release

Releases a staging nexus release

### Synopsis


This pipeline step command releases a Nexus staging repository

```
jx step nexus release
```

### Examples

```
  jx step nexus release
```

### Options

```
  -d, --drop-on-fail   Should we drop the repository on failure (default true)
```
